Articles.Content: So I , Im new to forums not ksp but anyway In The Middle of building A mun lander I noticed Somthing at the bottom of my vab ... THE INTERNALS OFF the ( new ) Mark 1 cot pick , Ya thats right So ... Explanation ?
It's a glitch. The view of the inside is for the Kerbal camera and the eventual IVA view. Not much to it.
But meant In in .16 1vas are for .17 right?
That internal view is what you're seeing through the Kerbal crew-cam on the bottom-right of the screen. It's already there, and doubtless form the basis for the new IVA system in 0.17.

That internal view is what you're seeing through the Kerbal crew-cam on the bottom-right of the screen. It's already there, and doubtless form the basis for the new IVA system in 0.17.

No i said in the V.a.b ... Were u build rockets That type off inside!
That's what they're talking about. It's a glitch. It somehow got into the VAB. That's what you're seeing, the internal view inside the VAB.
Ok ... It stoped anyway ... And my first mun landing

Ok ... It stoped anyway ... And my first mun landing

Very nice. Now try minmus. Easier to land, harder to get to.
